verses.verse: <S%H7637><s%>"'In the seventh <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work:<s%> it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of blowing of trumpets to <S%H8643>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

and their meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H352>ram,<s%>
and <S%H259>one<s%> tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs;<s%>
and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> to make atonement for <S%H3722>you;<s%>

besides the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of the new <S%H2320>moon,<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H8548>it,<s%> and the continual burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H5262>it,<s%> and their drink offerings, according to their <S%H4941>ordinance,<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H6218><s%>"'On the tenth day of this <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> you shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> and you shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no kind of <S%H4399>work;<s%>

but you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H8141>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>old;<s%> they shall be to you without blemish;

and their meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%>
a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs:<s%>

<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> besides the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> and the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the meal <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H4503>it,<s%> and their drink offerings.

<S%H2568><s%>"'On the fifteenth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> you shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> and you shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%>

and you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>old;<s%> they shall be without blemish;

and their meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%>
and a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H3532>lambs;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H2403>offering,<s%> the meal <S%H2403>offering<s%> of <S%H5262>it,<s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H8145><s%>"'On the second <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall offer <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

and their meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the meal <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H4503>it,<s%> and their drink offerings.

<S%H7992><s%>"'On the third <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

and their meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the meal <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H5262>it,<s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H7243><s%>"'On the fourth <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

their meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H2403>offering,<s%> the meal <S%H2403>offering<s%> of <S%H5262>it,<s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H2549><s%>"'On the fifth <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

and their meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H5262>it,<s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H8345><s%>"'On the sixth <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

and their meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H5262>it,<s%> and the drink offerings of it.

<S%H7637><s%>"'On the seventh <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

and their meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H5262>it,<s%> and the drink offering of it.
<S%H8066><s%>"'On the eighth <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall have a solemn <S%H6116>assembly:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work;<s%>

but you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

their meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> for the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> for the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> shall be according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinance:<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the meal <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H5262>it,<s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H6213><s%>"'You shall offer these to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in your set <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> besides your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and your freewill <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> for your burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and for your meal <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> and for your drink <S%H5262>offerings,<s%> and for your peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>'"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
